events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The reported issue has been identified as related to a refund request for an incorrect order.
An agent from the refunds team has been assigned to handle this case and will respond shortly.
Hello! I’m sorry to hear you received the wrong item. I’m here to help you with your refund request.
Could you please provide a photo of the item received and your order number so we can process the refund quickly?
Here is a photo of the item I received instead of the one I ordered. My order number is 123456789.
Thank you for the details. We will issue a full refund to your original payment method within 3-5 business days.
Thank you for resolving this so quickly! I appreciate the prompt refund offer.
We have processed your refund and sent you confirmation. Please let us know if you need further assistance.
Just checking in to confirm that your refund was received and everything is resolved to your satisfaction.
Since we have not heard back and the refund was processed, we will now close this case. Thank you for contacting us.
We have sent a short satisfaction survey to help us improve our customer service. Your feedback is appreciated.
